name: Mystic Oud
description: A deep and mysterious scent with warm notes of oud and cedarwood, balanced by the richness of amber.

name: Citrus Storm
description: A fresh and energizing blend of lemon and bergamot, with a smooth musk undertone.

name: Spicy Leather
description: An intense and captivating scent combining black pepper, leather, and earthy vetiver.

name: Midnight Woods
description: A tranquil and rich aroma with sandalwood, relaxing lavender, and a touch of ambergris.

name: Frosted Horizon
description: A crisp and invigorating scent with mint and eucalyptus, softened by a musky base.

name: Velvet Rose
description: A luxurious and elegant blend of rose and jasmine, enhanced by a touch of white musk.

name: Golden Amber
description: A warm and rich fragrance with sweet amber, vanilla, and earthy patchouli.

name: Iris Bloom
description: A delicate floral scent with notes of iris, fresh bergamot, and warm tonka bean.

name: Citrus Charm
description: A vibrant and uplifting fragrance featuring mandarin, oid_range blossom, and a hint of musk.

name: Sweet Peony
description: A soft and romantic scent with sweet peony, juicy raspberry, and gentle woody undertones.
